dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach me, puny creature?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I seek knowledge and wish to converse.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Ha! You are an insignificant being in the grand scheme of this realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your power. I come in peace. Let us understand each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understand? There is nothing to understand, only power rules here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to bargain with you for mutual benefit. We can help each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bargain? Your attempts at diplomacy amuse me. There is only one outcome with creatures like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see that words hold no meaning for you. Farewell then, may our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you retreat, remember this encounter. You are no match for the darkness that looms.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power is great, but so is your ignorance. Let us exchange knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance? You dare insult me? Your arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I meant no offense. I only seek to learn from a being of such might.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learn then, and remember your place in the hierarchy of this world.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your pride blinds you. Farewell, I will not provoke a pointless conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave then, insignificant fool. Make haste before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness does not intimidate me. Let us discuss terms of coexistence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexistence? Your bravery is amusing. Let us see how long it lasts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer peace between us. There is no need for needless aggression.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? I have no interest in your trivial concepts. Prepare yourself for what comes next.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems talks are futile with one so consumed by darkness. I bid you farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell then, ignorant being. Your fate is sealed by your own ignorance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to quarrel. I seek no trouble. I simply wish to pass through peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peacefully? You are a pest in my presence, intruding where you do not belong.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any disturbance. I will leave without causing trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies mean nothing to me. Your actions speak louder than words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will depart now. May our paths diverge without further conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave then, insignificant creature. Do not return to these lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If departure is what you desire, then I shall leave. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant one. May you never cross my path again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences? Bold words for one as feeble as you. Let us see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not engage in meaningless violence. Let us part ways without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words are wind. Actions speak louder. Prepare for what comes next, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. If you seek conflict, you shall have it. Brace yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? We shall see soon enough. Prepare for battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come with no ill intentions. I wish only to understand this realm and its inhabitants.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understand? You understand nothing, insignificant being. Your presence is a stain on this world.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and peace. Can we not coexist without animosity?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Animosity is a luxury I do not provide. Be gone before I decide otherwise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I will leave. Farewell, may our paths never meet again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant one. May the darkness swallow you whole.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your hostility is unwarranted. I shall remember this encounter. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Remember and tremble, for you face powers beyond your feeble comprehension.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness may consume you, but I choose to approach with an open mind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Open mind? Your naivety is astounding. Let us see how long that lasts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my leave then. May your darkness find balance in the twilight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave and do not return, for the shadows hunger for the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Farewell, creature of shadows. May reason find you one day.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reason? Reason is irrelevant in the face of darkness. Know your place!
